title: Atlassian warns of exploit for Confluence data wiping bug, get patching
description: Atlassian warned admins that a public exploit is now available for a critical Confluence security flaw that can be used in data destruction attacks targeting Internet-exposed and unpatched instances. [...]

title: Ace Hardware says 1,202 devices were hit during cyberattack
description: Ace Hardware confirmed that a cyberattack is preventing local stores and customers from placing orders as the company works to restore 196 servers. [...]

title: New macOS 'KandyKorn' malware targets cryptocurrency engineers
description: A new macOS malware dubbed 'KandyKorn' has been spotted in a campaign attributed to the North Korean Lazarus hacking group, targeting blockchain engineers of a cryptocurrency exchange platform. [...]

title: BlackCat ransomware claims breach of healthcare giant Henry Schein
description: The BlackCat (ALPHV) ransomware gang claims it breached the network of healthcare giant Henry Schein and stole dozens of terabytes of data, including payroll data and shareholder information. [...]

title: Mortgage giant Mr. Cooper hit by cyberattack impacting IT systems
description: U.S. mortgage lending giant Mr. Cooper was breached in a cyberattack that caused the company to shut down IT systems, including access to their online payment portal. [...]

title: HelloKitty ransomware now exploiting Apache ActiveMQ flaw in attacks
description: A remote code execution (RCE) flaw impacting Apache ActiveMQ has been under active exploitation by threat actors who use HelloKitty ransomware payloads. [...]

title: Cloudflare Dashboard and APIs down after data center power outage
description: An ongoing Cloudflare outage has taken down many of its products, including the company's dashboard and related application programming interfaces (APIs) customers use to manage and read service configurations. [...]

title: Boeing confirms cyberattack amid LockBit ransomware claims
description: Aerospace giant Boeing is investigating a cyberattack that impacted its parts and distribution business after the LockBit ransomware gang claimed that they breached the company's network and stole data. [...]

title: Microsoft pledges to bolster security as part of ‘Secure Future’ initiative
description: Microsoft announced today the 'Secure Future Initiative,' pledging to improve the built-in security of its products and platforms to better protect customers against escalating cybersecurity threats. [...]

title: Okta data breach exposed personal information of employees
description: Okta is warning nearly 5,000 employees that the company was impacted by a data breach that exposed personal information. [...]

title: Okta hit by third-party data breach exposing employee information
description: Okta is warning nearly 5,000 current and former employees that their personal information was exposed after a third-party vendor was breached. [...]

title: Your end-users are reusing passwords – that’s a big problem
description: Password reuse is a difficult vulnerability for IT teams to get full visibility over. Learn more from Specops Software on how to mitigate the risk of compromised credentials. [...]
